name: test_e2e_with_logs[501_GQL_FRAG_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `GQL_FRAG_001` |
| **Name** | GraphQL fragment with typename introspection |
| **Category** | GRAPHQL |
| **Subcategory** | fragment |
| **Severity** | `MEDIUM` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `fragment F on User{id,secret}query{user{...F,__typename}}`
- **Encoded**: `fragment%20F%20on%20User%7Bid%2Csecret%7Dquery%7Buser%7B...F%2C__typename%7D%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~48000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:44:25.000 UTC
